x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/supplyrequest-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/SupplyRequest \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"SupplyRequest","id":"13fa7194-f87a-4fcc-84af-46ee128a4e99","identifier":[{"value":"Order10284"}],"status":"active","category":{"coding":[{"code":"central","display":"Central Stock Resupply"}]},"priority":"asap","itemCodeableConcept":{"coding":[{"code":"BlueTubes","display":"Blood collect tubes blue cap"}]},"quantity":{"value":10},"occurrenceDateTime":"2016-12-31T08:00:00+08:00","authoredOn":"2016-12-31T08:00:00+08:00","requester":{"display":"Henry Seven"},"supplier":[{"display":"Vendor1"}],"reasonCode":[{"coding":[{"code":"stock_low","display":"Refill due to low stock"}]}],"deliverFrom":{"display":"Location 1"},"deliverTo":{"display":"GoodHealth Clinic Receiving"},"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.859+08:00"}}'
